languages.text: {n}Мрачно зыркнув по сторонам, арбитр сухо произносит:{/n} "Не думал, что они осмелятся тревожить Вольного Торговца своими мелкими жалобами. Дисциплина среди поломоев отвратительная. Они думают, что раз им доверены швабры, а не оружие, то они могут исполнять свой долг с меньшим старанием".

{n}With a grim glance around, Solomorne says dryly,{/n} "I didn't think they would dare disturb the Rogue Trader with their petty gripes. Discipline among the deck cleaners is abominable. They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."
languages.original_text: {n}Мрачно зыркнув по сторонам, арбитр сухо произносит:{/n} "Не думал, что они осмелятся тревожить Вольного Торговца своими мелкими жалобами. Дисциплина среди поломоев отвратительная. Они думают, что раз им доверены швабры, а не оружие, то они могут исполнять свой долг с меньшим старанием".

Discipline among the deck cleaners is abominable. They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."

They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."

{n}With a grim glance around, Solomorne says dryly,{/n} "I didn't think they would dare disturb the Rogue Trader with their petty gripes. Discipline among the deck cleaners is abominable. They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."

They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."

{n}With a grim glance around, Solomorne says dryly,{/n} "I didn't think they would dare disturb the Rogue Trader with their petty gripes. Discipline among the deck cleaners is abominable. They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは周囲に厳しい目を向けながら、乾いた口調で言った。{/n}「まさか、あの連中が些細な不満でローグトレーダーを煩わせるとは思いませんでした。デッキ清掃係の規律はひどいものです。モップを任されたからといって、武器を持っていない分だけ気楽に義務を果たせると思っているようです」
languages.original_text: {n}With a grim glance around, Solomorne says dryly,{/n} "I didn't think they would dare disturb the Rogue Trader with their petty gripes. Discipline among the deck cleaners is abominable. They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは周囲に厳しい目を向けながら、乾いた口調で言った。{/n}「まさか、あの連中が些細な不満でローグトレーダーを煩わせるとは思いませんでした。デッキ清掃係の規律はひどいものです。モップを任されたからといって、武器を持っていない分だけ気楽に義務を果たせると思っているようです」

languages.text: {n}Nachdem Solomorne sich grimmig umgesehen hat, sagt er trocken:{/n} "Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass sie es wagen würden, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit ihren banalen Nörgeleien zu stören. Die Disziplin unter den Deckreinigungskräften ist katastrophal. Sie glauben, nur weil ihnen Besen statt Waffen anvertraut wurden, können sie ihre Pflicht weniger eifrig erfüllen."
languages.original_text: {n}With a grim glance around, Solomorne says dryly,{/n} "I didn't think they would dare disturb the Rogue Trader with their petty gripes. Discipline among the deck cleaners is abominable. They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem Solomorne sich grimmig umgesehen hat, sagt er trocken:{/n} "Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass sie es wagen würden, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mit ihren banalen Nörgeleien zu stören. Die Disziplin unter den Deckreinigungskräften ist katastrophal. Sie glauben, nur weil ihnen Besen statt Waffen anvertraut wurden, können sie ihre Pflicht weniger eifrig erfüllen."

languages.text: {n}Balayant les environs d'un regard sévère, Solomorne répond sèchement :{/n} « Je ne pensais pas qu'ils auraient l'audace de déranger {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour si peu. Les préposés au nettoyage font preuve d'une indiscipline crasse. Sous prétexte d'être équipés de balais plutôt que d'armes, ils s'estiment en droit de bayer aux corneilles au risque de négliger leur devoir. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a grim glance around, Solomorne says dryly,{/n} "I didn't think they would dare disturb the Rogue Trader with their petty gripes. Discipline among the deck cleaners is abominable. They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Balayant les environs d'un regard sévère, Solomorne répond sèchement :{/n} « Je ne pensais pas qu'ils auraient l'audace de déranger {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour si peu. Les préposés au nettoyage font preuve d'une indiscipline crasse. Sous prétexte d'être équipés de balais plutôt que d'armes, ils s'estiment en droit de bayer aux corneilles au risque de négliger leur devoir. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne lanza una mirada sombría a su alrededor y dice con sorna:{/n} «No imaginé que osarían incordiar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente con sus miserables protestas. La disciplina entre los limpiacubiertas es abominable. Se creen que pueden desempeñar sus obligaciones con menos diligencia solo porque les han pertrechado con fregonas en vez de armas».
languages.original_text: {n}With a grim glance around, Solomorne says dryly,{/n} "I didn't think they would dare disturb the Rogue Trader with their petty gripes. Discipline among the deck cleaners is abominable. They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne lanza una mirada sombría a su alrededor y dice con sorna:{/n} «No imaginé que osarían incordiar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente con sus miserables protestas. La disciplina entre los limpiacubiertas es abominable. Se creen que pueden desempeñar sus obligaciones con menos diligencia solo porque les han pertrechado con fregonas en vez de armas».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙面容阴沉地扫视着四周，以干巴巴的声音开了口。{/n}“没想到，他们竟敢用这么琐碎的事情来打扰行商浪人。甲板清洁团队的纪律状况非常糟糕。只因为他们手里拿的不是武器，而是拖把，他们便以为自己无需勤勤恳恳地履行职责。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a grim glance around, Solomorne says dryly,{/n} "I didn't think they would dare disturb the Rogue Trader with their petty gripes. Discipline among the deck cleaners is abominable. They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙面容阴沉地扫视着四周，以干巴巴的声音开了口。{/n}“没想到，他们竟敢用这么琐碎的事情来打扰行商浪人。甲板清洁团队的纪律状况非常糟糕。只因为他们手里拿的不是武器，而是拖把，他们便以为自己无需勤勤恳恳地履行职责。”

languages.text: {n}Ümitsizce gözlerini kırpıştıran Solomorne, duygusuzca cevap veriyor.{/n} "Küçük dertleriyle Hür Tacir'i rahatsız etmeye cesaret edeceklerini sanmazdım. Güverte temizlikçileri arasında disiplin berbat, ellerine silah yerine paspas tutuşturuldu diye titiz olmalarına lüzum yok sanıyorlar."
languages.original_text: {n}With a grim glance around, Solomorne says dryly,{/n} "I didn't think they would dare disturb the Rogue Trader with their petty gripes. Discipline among the deck cleaners is abominable. They think that because they have been entrusted with mops rather than weapons, they can do their duty with less diligence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ümitsizce gözlerini kırpıştıran Solomorne duygusuzca cevap verir.{/n} "Küçük dertleriyle Hür Tacir'i rahatsız etmeye cesaret edeceklerini sanmazdım. Güverte temizleyicileri arasında disiplin berbat; ellerine silah yerine paspas tutuşturuldu diye titiz olmalarına lüzum yok sanırlar."
